Package control

Interface PetrinetMenuController

All Known Subinterfaces:
PetrinetToolbarController
All Known Implementing Classes:
MainController
public interface PetrinetMenuController
An interface defining methods for entries in the menus.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    disableAutomaticBoundednessCheck()
    Disables automatic checks for boundedness.
    void
    enableAutomaticBoundednessCheck()
    Enables automatic checks for boundedness.
    void
    onAnalyseMany()
    Opens a dialog to choose (multiple) pnml file(s) to analyse.
    void
    onChangeLookAndFeel()
    Changes between the LookAndFeel "Nimbus" (default) and "Metal" (java default).
    void
    onClose()
    Closes the currently opened file.
    void
    onCloseEditor()
    Switch to ToolbarMode VIEW.
    void
    onExit()
    Exits the program.
    void
    onInfo()
    Opens an info box showing java version and user directory.
    void
    onNew()
    Opens a new GraphStreamPetrinetPanel containing an empty PetrinetGraph and sets the panel to ToolbarMode EDITOR (see ToolbarMode).
    void
    onOpen()
    Opens a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet.
    void
    onOpenEditor()
    Switch to ToolbarMode EDITOR.
    void
    onOpenInNewTab()
    Opens a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet and open it in a new tab.
    void
    onReload()
    Reloads the contents of the currently opened file.
    void
    onSave()
    Saves changes to the file the petrinet has been opened from.
    void
    onSaveAs()
    Opens a dialog to choose a directory and file name to save the current petrinet to.

  • Method Details

    • onNew

      void onNew()
      Opens a new GraphStreamPetrinetPanel containing an empty PetrinetGraph and sets the panel to ToolbarMode EDITOR (see ToolbarMode).

    • onOpen

      void onOpen()
      Opens a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet.

    • onOpenInNewTab

      void onOpenInNewTab()
      Opens a dialog to choose a pnml file from which to load a petrinet and open it in a new tab.

    • onSave

      void onSave()
      Saves changes to the file the petrinet has been opened from.

    • onSaveAs

      void onSaveAs()
      Opens a dialog to choose a directory and file name to save the current petrinet to.

    • onReload

      void onReload()
      Reloads the contents of the currently opened file.

    • onAnalyseMany

      void onAnalyseMany()
      Opens a dialog to choose (multiple) pnml file(s) to analyse. The results are printed in the text area of MainFrame.

    • onClose

      void onClose()
      Closes the currently opened file.

    • onExit

      void onExit()
      Exits the program.

    • onOpenEditor

      void onOpenEditor()
      Switch to ToolbarMode EDITOR.

    • onCloseEditor

      void onCloseEditor()
      Switch to ToolbarMode VIEW.

    • onChangeLookAndFeel

      void onChangeLookAndFeel()
      Changes between the LookAndFeel "Nimbus" (default) and "Metal" (java default).

    • onInfo

      void onInfo()
      Opens an info box showing java version and user directory.

    • enableAutomaticBoundednessCheck

      void enableAutomaticBoundednessCheck()
      Enables automatic checks for boundedness.

    • disableAutomaticBoundednessCheck

      void disableAutomaticBoundednessCheck()
      Disables automatic checks for boundedness.
